div.p: A345, Royal Park Zoological Society letter and minute book, pp. 19-20, Mitchell Library, State Library of New South Wales, Sydney.
I have the honor to inform you, that I have been instructed by the Trustees of the Royal Park to convey to you the following resolution passed this day at a Meeting of the Trustees.
Moved by Clement Hodgkinson Esq. and seconded by Brough Smyth Esq. and carried.

"That a letter be adressed to the Chairman of the Central Board of Health; complaining of the present unsatisfactory state of the manure depot contiguous to the Royal Park and asking when the proposed deodorising will be carried out at the Depot.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
